News.headline: Match Preview: Dagenham and Redbridge v Torquay United
News.page_title: Match Preview: Dagenham and Redbridge v Torquay United
News.URL_keywords: Match Preview: Dagenham and Redbridge v Torquay United
News.short_description: A preview of the Daggers Vanarama National League fixture against Torquay United on Tuesday.
News.description:
The Daggers are back at the Chigwell Construction Stadium following their 4-1 home defeat to play off rivals Barrow on Saturday. 

Torquay United are 17th in the table and have won six, drew four and lost twelve of their twenty two games so far this season. 

Previous 5 Results

Daggers
Daggers 1-4 Barrow
Maidstone 0-1 Daggers 
York 0-2 Daggers 
Halifax 2-1 Daggers (Emirates FA Cup) 
Daggers 0-5 Gateshead 

Torquay United
Tranmere 2-1 Torquay
Torquay 3-0 Solihull Moors
Torquay 1-1 Wrexham
Guieseley 2-0 Torquay
Torquay 1-2 Southport

Team News
The Daggers are without a number of players for Saturday. Okenabirhie, Robson, Williams, Howell, Pennell, Ling and Robinson are all set to miss out. Scott Doe could return after an injury against Maidstone. Andre Boucaud will be back after missing the game against Barrow due to suspension for his fifth yellow card of the season. 

Previous Meetings
This will be the tenth meeting between the two teams, with Torquay wining four of the previous nine games compared to the two wins for the Daggers. 

Fixtures
There are a full list of Vanarama National League fixtures on Tuesday with a 7:45pm kick off.  

Sutton United v Dover Athletic
Boreham Wood v Braintree Town
Maidstone United v Eastleigh
Southport FC v Solihull Moors
Dagenham and Redbridge v Torquay United
Chester FC v North Ferriby United
Macclesfield Town v Barrow
Woking v Bromley
Gateshead v Tranmere Rovers
Lincoln City v Wrexham
York City v Guiseley

Tickets
Ticket information for the game can be found here.

Social Media & Online
Follow the Daggers on Twitter for live updates throughout the match (@Dag_RedFC). There will also be updates on our Facebookpage (OfficialDaggers). After the match there will be a match report on the website.
